effect.en: Draw 3 cards. If you do, this Pokémon is now Asleep.
effect.fr: Piochez 3 cartes. Dans ce cas, ce Pokémon est maintenant Endormi.
effect.es: Roba 3 cartas. Si lo haces, este Pokémon pasa a estar Dormido.
effect.it: Pesca tre carte. Se lo fai, questo Pokémon viene addormentato.
effect.pt: Compre 3 cartas. Se fizer isto, este Pokémon ficará Adormecido.
effect.de: Ziehe 3 Karten. Wenn du das machst, schläft dieses Pokémon jetzt.

description.en: To make itself appear intimidatingly beefy, it tightly cinches its waist with its twin tails.
